summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Revel Nail Dip Powder Starter Kit
Review Date: 2016/09/12
Store: Revel Nail
Product Description: ['The kit will contain the following items:15 ml (or 0.5 OZ) of Step #1 Probase']
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Revel Nail', 'Included Components': 'Dip Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Weight': '11.04 Ounces', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '608766575246'}
Review Text: This set of nail products is the same materials that my salon uses  for the dipped gel nail treatments. However, my results have been clumsy at best, and for a real finished manicure, the salon is  clearly the way to go. In my case, I am in and out of swimming pools a number of times each week and my nails have grown thin and easy to split on two fingers particularly. I have found that treating just these chronic splitters with the dipping technique has allowed them to grow to a reasonable length. The intense exposure to acetone in order to remove the coating is pretty rough on them, though. Still, if you are adept manicurist of your own nails, then this set will certainly save you money and, in the properly trained hands, yield a professional quality end result.
Review Title: Good Product
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Butecare Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum for Long - Amazon Vine
Review Date: 2018/11/05
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.5 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: I tried this product on two days and both times, it left my eyelids feeling weird. That tired-eyes, sleepy feeling.  So, I stopped using it. It didn't have a chance to work for me since I feel very cautious about anything around my eyes. I guess caution outweighs vanity in my case.
Review Title: Great Idea but Not for Me
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bololo Baby Hair Clippers - Quiet Kids Hair Trimmer, Cordless & Waterproof Chargeable, Children with Autism, ABS Ceramic Blade, Haircut Kit for Kids Infants Men and Women,Green,
Review Date: 2019/01/05
Store: MOM&HOME
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Trimming', 'Color': 'White', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'MOM&HOME', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.38 x 3.66 x 2.32 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '691608094128', 'Manufacturer': 'Mom&Home'}
Review Text: This clipper is white and not green, but that is not an important point. The point is that these clippers perform as advertised. They are quiet, not silent, but quiet enough to not alarm a skittish child or nervous poodle, depending on the task at hand. The cute little cape included is just that- cute, but not near big enough to catch significant clippings from a haircut. I like the fact that they charge from a USB port and come with a nice little pouch big enough to hold the clippers and accessories so you can slip the whole shebang in a dryer when not in use. The charge holds long enough for a couple of cuts, and the clippers recharge quickly. They are very nice and will be quite useful for some time.
Review Title: Quiet and Easy to Use
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Jade Rose Quartz Roller for Face 2 in 1 Gua Sha Set Including Rose Quartz Roller and Jade Face Massager 100% Real Natural Jade Facial Roller Anti Aging Face Roller Massager by Rayfarmo
Review Date: 2019/03/24
Store: RAYFARMO
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 2 x 0.5 inches; 7.04 Ounces', 'UPC': '680727935887', 'Manufacturer': 'RAYFARMO'}
Review Text: There are so many things suggested by the beauty industry to eliminate fine lines and wrinkles. There are and lotions (called serums in today’s beauty parlance). And, there are surgeries and injections, peels and a myriad of other things to try that may or may not work. Fine lines and wrinkles are going to happen, folks. You can work to minimize them, but, short of stretching the skin as taut as a drum, they are going to occur. Now, the gua sha roller and scraper may make a difference. Used after a good washing and a rub of whatever moisturizing emollient followed by rubbing gently with the roller or scraper simply feels very nice. The quartz is cool and soothing to the skin, and definitely stimulates circulation. It is a pleasant routine and provides the luxury of a spa in your own home. If they minimize fine lines and wrinkles, fine, but sometimes feeling nice is enough.
Review Title: Feels Nice
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The analyzed purchase history reveals a consumer who exhibits a moderate comfort with beauty and personal care products, favoring practicality and ease of use over luxury. Consistent ratings around 3 to 5 suggest a cautious approach, with a tendency to appreciate products that perform as advertised while expressing disappointment when expectations are not met.

Common themes emerge around self-care and household needs, particularly in beauty treatments and grooming, hinting at a preference for cost-effective, at-home solutions like dipping nails and hair trimming for children. The user's reviews highlight a focus on user-friendliness and efficiency, favoring products that simplify routine tasks.

Quality preferences lean toward functional design, as noted in the admiration for quiet clippers and multi-use rollers, as well as sensitivity towards irritation or discomfort, particularly around delicate areas like the eyes. Price sensitivity is evident; the consumer seeks value-driven options but balances this with caution when efficacy is a concern.

Overall, the core preferences indicate a practical and thoughtful buyer who values usability and comfort in beauty and grooming solutions, seeks products that facilitate self-care routines, and prioritizes quality while being mindful of their budget.

target_interaction.title: No Instructions A Minus
target_interaction.text: While there are numerous how-to videos available online, derma planing is something that should be attempted with caution and one wishes the individual blades purchased had reassuring instructions included. As it is, the box is printed in Japanese or Chinese characters which, of course, provide no information at all to the consumer in the USA. The name "Beautyguard" is the only English that appears on the packaging. There are a couple of drawings, but these are captioned in characters as well. The blades are very sharp, give a quality close shave, and should only be used on smooth, unblemished skin.
target_interaction.title_meta: Women Facial Razor for Hair Removal - Dermaplaning Tool Peach Fuzz Trimmer Womens Fine Hair Remover Eyebrow Razors and Dermaplane Face Shavers Women's Exfoliating for Sensitive Skin Essential Travel
features: 🌷 100% Japanese Blades QUALITY Guranteed. *** DIAMOND CUT FOR PRECISION ***Official US Trademarked Product.
🌷 REMOVE FACIAL HAIR “peach fuzz” in the privacy of your home DERMAPLANING and during work travel.
🌷 ACHIEVE PERFECTLY SHAPED EYEBROWS with painless and effortless actions. No more tweezing pain.
🌷 GREAT TRAVEL RAZOR for cleanup of little detailed areas during vacation & works well with sensitive skin.
🌷 30-DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE & 100% refund of your purchase price, no questions asked.
description: MODEMODE Women's Facial Razor Home Dermaplaning - Eyebrow Razor For Women Face Peach Fuzz Hair Removal Womens Face Exfoliating At Daily Eyebrow Shaping Tool
